content:
Hi Guys...,

Not really sure what I'm doing lol... but on the Module List, the "more" option isn't working.

Has anyone else come across this?

I've been experimenting and if jquery.ui isn't loading then the toggle() function won't work.

Can anyone shed some light on this please?

I'm using a child theme from Basis.

Many thanks
it works on the latest sandbox. do you get any console errors?

docwilmot said:

it works on the latest sandbox. do you get any console errors?

I'm not that familiar with js etc... But does this mean anything... the [[functionLocation]]: <unknown>

jquery.ui.jpg
Is this after upgrading to 1.17? Or just in general?

Laryn said:

Is this after upgrading to 1.17? Or just in general?

I've had it for a while, so just in general.

The site I'm playing with is now 1.17.

I've just spun up a 1.16.2 and installed the same theme and everything is working, so I'm going to install the same modules and test it one at a time.

Found the culprit... EU Cookie Compliance... and when it popped up I did click on OK....

Just going to experiment now.
